content.rendered:
Welcome to Medigenix

Gastroenterology And Dermatology

Dr. Bhavik Shah - Best Gastroenterologist in Raipur

After finishing his Graduation from prestigious Pravara Institute of Medical Sciences, Loni in 2011, Dr. Bhavik Shah joined Choithram Hospital and Research Centre in Indore.
Learn more

Dr. Priya Diwaker - Best Dermatologist in Raipur

Dr. Priya Diwaker, completed her MBBS from government medical college, Bilaspur and her post graduation in Dermatology from JJM Medical College, Davangere.
Learn more

Gastroenterology Services

Gastroenterology Specialists
Learn more
